title: macOS Agent Installation - Older Versions (macOS 10.15 Catalina to macOS 14 Sonoma)

metadata.summary: This document provides details of how to install, verify, and uninstall the LimaCharlie Endpoint Agent on macOS (versions 10.15 Catalina though to macOS 14 Sonoma). We also offer documentation for [macOS 10.14 and prior](/v2/docs/macos-agent-installation-older-versions), and [macOS 10.15 and newe...
